tool_description: This data API from DataWeave provides details of all recharge options available with various telecom operators (India) across all circles. The data is aggregated from the websites of all telecom operators
name: Telecom Data
title: Telecom Data

api_list.name: Telecom Data
api_list.description: This data API provides details of all recharge options available with various telecom operators across all circles. The data is aggregated from the websites of all telecom operators

required_parameters.name: operator
required_parameters.description: BSNL, Tata DOCOMO, Uninor, Idea, Aircel, Reliance CDMA, Reliance GSM, Vodafone, Airtel

required_parameters.name: circle
required_parameters.description: Karnataka, Uttar Pradesh (E), Chennai, Maharashtra, Andhra Pradesh, Bihar, Kerala, North East, Orissa, Kolkata, Madhya Pradesh, Haryana, JK, Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh (W), West Bengal, Punjab, Gujrat, Rajasthan
